Module WGUScheduler
Package com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Controllers

Class CustomerController

java.lang.Object
com.example.wgusoftware2scheduler.Controllers.CustomerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
CanPass
public class CustomerController extends Object implements CanPass
CustomerController is a class that implements the CanPass interface and handles the functionality for the customer screen of the application. It allows users to add, update, or delete customers and validates their input.
